sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT DISTINCT 
ISNULL(MAX(CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION),0) AS SYS_CHANGE_VERSION	   
FROM CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [DBO].[tbl_login_profiles],0) CT
LEFT JOIN [DBO].[tbl_login_profiles] F
 ON CT.[ProfileId] = F.[ProfileId]
WHERE ISNULL(CT.[SYS_CHANGE_VERSION],'') > ''
SELECT SYS_CHANGE_VERSION FROM ChangeTracking_Fabric_Update WHERE TableName = 'tbl_login_profiles'

SELECT
      CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION ,
      CT.SYS_CHANGE_CREATION_VERSION ,
      CT.SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION ,
      CT.SYS_CHANGE_COLUMNS ,      
      CT.SYS_CHANGE_CONTEXT ,
      CT.[ProfileId] as CT_ProfileId,       
      REPLACE(F.[ProfileId],'^','') AS [ProfileId]
     ,REPLACE(F.[LoginId],'^','') AS [LoginId]
     ,REPLACE(F.[FirstName],'^','') AS [FirstName]
     ,REPLACE(F.[LastName],'^','') AS [LastName]
     ,REPLACE(F.[ParentId],'^','') AS [ParentId]
     ,REPLACE(F.[EmailUID],'^','') AS [EmailUID]
     ,REPLACE(F.[EmailPWD],'^','') AS [EmailPWD]
     ,REPLACE(F.[HeaderPreference],'^','') AS [HeaderPreference]
     ,REPLACE(F.[AddressBookPreference],'^','') AS [AddressBookPreference]
     ,REPLACE(F.[HelpPreference],'^','') AS [HelpPreference]
     ,REPLACE(F.[LoggingLevel],'^','') AS [LoggingLevel]
     ,REPLACE(F.[DefaultRefresh],'^','') AS [DefaultRefresh]
     ,REPLACE(F.[DefaultRecordsetSize],'^','') AS [DefaultRecordsetSize]
     ,REPLACE(F.[SiteId],'^','') AS [SiteId]
     ,CASE
    WHEN REPLACE(F.[UseThumbs], '^', '') = 'True' THEN 1
    WHEN REPLACE(F.[UseThumbs], '^', '') = 'False' THEN 0
    ELSE REPLACE(F.[UseThumbs], '^', '')
END AS [UseThumbs]
     ,REPLACE(F.[LoginURL],'^','') AS [LoginURL]
     ,CASE
    WHEN REPLACE(F.[o365integration], '^', '') = 'True' THEN 1
    WHEN REPLACE(F.[o365integration], '^', '') = 'False' THEN 0
    ELSE REPLACE(F.[o365integration], '^', '')
END AS [o365integration]
     ,REPLACE(F.[TimeZoneId],'^','') AS [TimeZoneId]
     ,REPLACE(F.[DateFormatId],'^','') AS [DateFormatId]
     ,REPLACE(F.[CreatedDate],'^','') AS [CreatedDate]
     ,REPLACE(F.[UpdatedDate],'^','') AS [UpdatedDate]
     ,REPLACE(F.[ActiveDirectoryId],'^','') AS [ActiveDirectoryId]
     ,REPLACE(F.[ePADExUserName],'^','') AS [ePADExUserName]
     ,CASE
    WHEN REPLACE(F.[usedefaultemail], '^', '') = 'True' THEN 1
    WHEN REPLACE(F.[usedefaultemail], '^', '') = 'False' THEN 0
    ELSE REPLACE(F.[usedefaultemail], '^', '')
END AS [usedefaultemail]
     ,REPLACE(F.[GreenlightSkin],'^','') AS [GreenlightSkin]
     ,REPLACE(F.[GreenlightMeasurementUnits],'^','') AS [GreenlightMeasurementUnits]
     ,CASE
    WHEN REPLACE(F.[CollapseModules], '^', '') = 'True' THEN 1
    WHEN REPLACE(F.[CollapseModules], '^', '') = 'False' THEN 0
    ELSE REPLACE(F.[CollapseModules], '^', '')
END AS [CollapseModules]
     ,REPLACE(F.[HistorySize],'^','') AS [HistorySize]
     ,REPLACE(F.[UltiproId],'^','') AS [UltiproId]
     ,REPLACE(F.[DefaultRecordsetSizeSGS5],'^','') AS [DefaultRecordsetSizeSGS5]
     ,REPLACE(F.[EmployeeTypeId],'^','') AS [EmployeeTypeId]
     ,CASE
    WHEN REPLACE(F.[vlmexclusion], '^', '') = 'True' THEN 1
    WHEN REPLACE(F.[vlmexclusion], '^', '') = 'False' THEN 0
    ELSE REPLACE(F.[vlmexclusion], '^', '')
END AS [vlmexclusion]
     ,REPLACE(F.[ChecklistLinkPreference],'^','') AS [ChecklistLinkPreference]
     ,REPLACE(F.[DefaultIntegrationInstance],'^','') AS [DefaultIntegrationInstance]
     ,REPLACE(F.[ThemeName],'^','') AS [ThemeName]
     ,REPLACE(F.[HomepagePreference],'^','') AS [HomepagePreference]
     ,REPLACE(F.[Layout],'^','') AS [Layout]    

      FROM CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [DBO].[tbl_login_profiles],@{activity('LookupOld').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) CT 
      LEFT JOIN [DBO].[tbl_login_profiles] F
      ON F.[ProfileId] = CT.[ProfileId] 
      WHERE ISNULL(CT.[SYS_CHANGE_VERSION],'') > ''
      AND ISNULL(CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION,0) <= @{activity('LookupNew').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}

SELECT
      CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION ,
      CT.SYS_CHANGE_CREATION_VERSION ,
      CT.SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION ,
      CT.SYS_CHANGE_COLUMNS ,      
      CT.SYS_CHANGE_CONTEXT ,
      CT.[ProfileId] as CT_ProfileId,       
      REPLACE(F.[ProfileId],'^','') AS [ProfileId]
     ,REPLACE(F.[LoginId],'^','') AS [LoginId]
     ,REPLACE(F.[FirstName],'^','') AS [FirstName]
     ,REPLACE(F.[LastName],'^','') AS [LastName]
     ,REPLACE(F.[ParentId],'^','') AS [ParentId]
     ,REPLACE(F.[EmailUID],'^','') AS [EmailUID]
     ,REPLACE(F.[EmailPWD],'^','') AS [EmailPWD]
     ,REPLACE(F.[HeaderPreference],'^','') AS [HeaderPreference]
     ,REPLACE(F.[AddressBookPreference],'^','') AS [AddressBookPreference]
     ,REPLACE(F.[HelpPreference],'^','') AS [HelpPreference]
     ,REPLACE(F.[LoggingLevel],'^','') AS [LoggingLevel]
     ,REPLACE(F.[DefaultRefresh],'^','') AS [DefaultRefresh]
     ,REPLACE(F.[DefaultRecordsetSize],'^','') AS [DefaultRecordsetSize]
     ,REPLACE(F.[SiteId],'^','') AS [SiteId]
     ,CASE
    WHEN REPLACE(F.[UseThumbs], '^', '') = 'True' THEN 1
    WHEN REPLACE(F.[UseThumbs], '^', '') = 'False' THEN 0
    ELSE REPLACE(F.[UseThumbs], '^', '')
END AS [UseThumbs]
     ,REPLACE(F.[LoginURL],'^','') AS [LoginURL]
     ,CASE
    WHEN REPLACE(F.[o365integration], '^', '') = 'True' THEN 1
    WHEN REPLACE(F.[o365integration], '^', '') = 'False' THEN 0
    ELSE REPLACE(F.[o365integration], '^', '')
END AS [o365integration]
     ,REPLACE(F.[TimeZoneId],'^','') AS [TimeZoneId]
     ,REPLACE(F.[DateFormatId],'^','') AS [DateFormatId]
     ,REPLACE(F.[CreatedDate],'^','') AS [CreatedDate]
     ,REPLACE(F.[UpdatedDate],'^','') AS [UpdatedDate]
     ,REPLACE(F.[ActiveDirectoryId],'^','') AS [ActiveDirectoryId]
     ,REPLACE(F.[ePADExUserName],'^','') AS [ePADExUserName]
     ,CASE
    WHEN REPLACE(F.[usedefaultemail], '^', '') = 'True' THEN 1
    WHEN REPLACE(F.[usedefaultemail], '^', '') = 'False' THEN 0
    ELSE REPLACE(F.[usedefaultemail], '^', '')
END AS [usedefaultemail]
     ,REPLACE(F.[GreenlightSkin],'^','') AS [GreenlightSkin]
     ,REPLACE(F.[GreenlightMeasurementUnits],'^','') AS [GreenlightMeasurementUnits]
     ,CASE
    WHEN REPLACE(F.[CollapseModules], '^', '') = 'True' THEN 1
    WHEN REPLACE(F.[CollapseModules], '^', '') = 'False' THEN 0
    ELSE REPLACE(F.[CollapseModules], '^', '')
END AS [CollapseModules]
     ,REPLACE(F.[HistorySize],'^','') AS [HistorySize]
     ,REPLACE(F.[UltiproId],'^','') AS [UltiproId]
     ,REPLACE(F.[DefaultRecordsetSizeSGS5],'^','') AS [DefaultRecordsetSizeSGS5]
     ,REPLACE(F.[EmployeeTypeId],'^','') AS [EmployeeTypeId]
     ,CASE
    WHEN REPLACE(F.[vlmexclusion], '^', '') = 'True' THEN 1
    WHEN REPLACE(F.[vlmexclusion], '^', '') = 'False' THEN 0
    ELSE REPLACE(F.[vlmexclusion], '^', '')
END AS [vlmexclusion]
     ,REPLACE(F.[ChecklistLinkPreference],'^','') AS [ChecklistLinkPreference]
     ,REPLACE(F.[DefaultIntegrationInstance],'^','') AS [DefaultIntegrationInstance]
     ,REPLACE(F.[ThemeName],'^','') AS [ThemeName]
     ,REPLACE(F.[HomepagePreference],'^','') AS [HomepagePreference]
     ,REPLACE(F.[Layout],'^','') AS [Layout]    

      FROM CHANGETABLE(CHANGES [DBO].[tbl_login_profiles],@{activity('LookupOld').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) CT 
      LEFT JOIN [DBO].[tbl_login_profiles] F
      ON F.[ProfileId] = CT.[ProfileId] 
      WHERE ISNULL(CT.[SYS_CHANGE_VERSION],'') > ''
      AND ISNULL(CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION,0) <= @{activity('LookupNew').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}
